headline: Selena Gomez, Taylor Swift, Jennifer Lopez And More Top Our Best-Dressed List This Week (PHOTOS)
short descr: The Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards and the 47th Annual Academy of Country Music Awards happened this week, and as with any
image_caption(s): Kelly Osbourne in Tony Ward Couture at Nickelodeon's 25th Annual Kids' Choice Awards
article: The Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards and the 47th Annual Academy of Country Music Awards happened this week, and as with any awards show, the stars come out in their finest. The Kids' Choice Awards are always a fun event -- stars let their hair down and have a chance to be playful with their style. But our favorite look of the week was FLOTUS on the red carpet in young designer Wes Gordon. Check out 24 celebrities who stayed stylish this week. Meanwhile, here's how to steal great celebrity style, for less.Want more? Be sure to check out Stylelist on Twitter, Facebook and Pinterest.

headline: Nicki Minaj, Lily Collins And 13 Fashion Fails This Week (PHOTOS)
short descr: We applaud celebrities for taking risks, but sometimes the result is attention-grabbing for the wrong reasons. This week
image_caption(s): Katy Perry in Gerlan Jeans at Nickelodeon's 25th Annual Kids' Choice Awards
article: We applaud celebrities for taking risks, but sometimes the result is attention-grabbing for the wrong reasons. This week we saw stars stepping out for the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards and the 47th Annual Academy of Country Music Awards. Some brought their A-game, and some...not so much. Check out our roundup of the stars who suffered a sartorial misstep this week. Agree or disagree?In related news: are Rihanna's red carpet pajamas a fashion hit or miss? Want more? Be sure to check out Stylelist on Twitter, Facebook and Pinterest.
